product.name: Marcelle Flawless Compact Foundation
product.description: The Marcelle Flawless Compact Foundation is inspired by the cutting-edge colour marching technology (adaptive pigments). This Flawless Skin-Fusion Foundation blends with skin for a natural finish without clogging pores. Based on popular demand, the Flawless Skin-Fusion Foundation is now available in a compact format! It instantly conceals dark circles, redness and all other imperfections.
